name: ListItem
shortdesc: An item in a list box, drop-down list, or tree view.

property.name: checked
property.shortdesc: The checked state of an item in a list.
property.description: When true, the item is marked with the platform-appropriate checkmark. When false, no checkmark is drawn, but space is reserved for it in the left margin, so that the item lines up with other checkable items. When undefined, no space is reserved for a checkmark.

property.name: expanded
property.description: When true, the item is in the expanded state and its children are shown, when false, it is collapsed and children are hidden.

property.name: selected
property.shortdesc: The selection state of this item.
property.description: When true, the item is part of the selection for its parent list. When false, the item is not selected. Set to true to select this item in a single-selection list, or to add it to the selection array for a multi-selection list.

property.name: image
property.shortdesc: An image object for an icon to display in the item.

property.name: text
property.shortdesc: The label text to display for the item, a localizable string.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: An object that contains one or more creation properties of the item &#40;properties used only when the element is created).
property.description: A ListItem object has no creation properties.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent element, a list control.
